Title: SmallTune
Description: SmallTune is an audioplayer with a long tradition, being completely rewritten and redesigned by now.
HomeWiki: SmallTune is a simple Audioplayer with a long tradition, which gets redesigned and renewed by now. It uses a SQLite - Database for fast searching and offers a pretty cool interface, designed by Bart Ebbekink (http://www.bartebbekink.nl/)
